metadata.description:
# TaalTools - Drum Multichannel Track Splitter
Creates 15 stereo tracks from a multichannel drum recording with proper naming, coloring and routing. Supports standard drum recording setups.
## Features - Automatically creates 15 stereo tracks - Sets up proper channel routing - Names and colors tracks according to common drum standards - Supports channels 3-32 for standard recording setups
